pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw:
The idea was for the world to be the only one to provide a service, and the request is forwarded to the relevant model from there. The world is not directly handling the request for model plugins, just forwarding the request to the relevant model.

Are you suggesting we have one service per model? And in the future, one service per sensor, etc? We could quickly end up with a huge list of services, which I thought was something we were trying to avoid.
